text: The main project has been renamed nilearn, but the main package is still named nisl.
title: Rename nisl package into nilearn

text:
> We should merge the canica PR first.

+1

>   • Should we provide a simple search-and-replace script ?

No.

>   • Should we create a full nisl tree and init files so that scripts importing
>     nisl modules would work with a warning ?

No.
